title: New: Giraffage – Feels
body:
A new track from **Giraffage** you say? Ah, the perfect remedy for those post-Festival blues.

Slightly cliched vocal samples and excessive use of ‘chillwave techniques’ make up the majority of the track, yet it works brilliantly, coming across all floaty and mystical. _Feels_ is taken from an as yet untitled EP due out later in the year. Check it out below.

Slightly cliched vocal samples and excessive use of ‘chillwave techniques’ make up the majority of the track, yet it works brilliantly, coming across all floaty and mystical.
